attributes.action: Large vehicle awareness course for no hgv/psv liecence holders
attributes.additional_details: So many drivers think it's alright to leave very little room I front of hgv/psv drivers at junctions and brake hard with the amount of these accidents easily preventable such the proposal of a course showing the dangers of braking hard I front of a large vehicle when you have just occupied their braking zones, along with undertaking, blind spots, weight differences, and turning spaces is required to educate these people who are guilty of endangering not only their own life but the lives of other road users around them
